MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L36 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Ardennes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.18am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.05am on 27th April 2021.
